displayProperties.description: Ground-zero for a cataclysmic event that left a massive shard of The Traveler—the source of every Guardian's power and immortality—embedded in the vast landscape. For years, only wild vegetation and the remains of an abandoned city were evidence of our forgotten past.
A whole Golden Age shipyard, but crawling with Fallen. A derelict spaceflight complex in the ruins of Old Russia.
What remains of humanity on Earth lives in the Last City, under the watchful eyes of the Guardians in their Tower.
We once looked to the Moon and saw hope. Now we see only the power of the Darkness. An ancient evil stirs beneath the shattered surface of the Moon.
A desolate and frozen moon, testament to humanity's ambition and hubris.
A hidden tech-metropolis, untouched by the Collapse.

Lush with giant twisted trees, deep caverns, waterfalls, and silver swamps, the origin of this planetoid remains unknown. What is clear is that the Vex have nearly transformed the entire planetoid into a Machine World, above and below the surface. For those Guardians willing to brave the dangers and explore the myriad of mysteries, treasures beyond the imagination await.
A long-hidden stronghold sacred to the Awoken of the Reef.
The inner workings of Savathûn's mind, brought to life within a mysterious throne world of her own making.

displayProperties.name: The Confluence West
displayProperties.description: A portal to **The Confluence**, powered by paracasual energies.

displayProperties.name: The Confluence East
displayProperties.description: A portal to **The Confluence**, powered by paracasual energies.

displayProperties.name: The Confluence South
displayProperties.description: A portal to **The Confluence**, powered by paracasual energies.

displayProperties.name: Ouroborea
displayProperties.description:
Destroy all blights then return to the foyer to shatter the previously-immune Void crystals.

_Accept this challenge, walk between worlds, and undo what has been done._

displayProperties.name: Ouroborea
displayProperties.description: A portal to the **Ascendant Plane**.

displayProperties.name: Forfeit Shrine
displayProperties.description:
Subdue the major blight by depositing all three charges beneath. Eliminate the Hive Knights.

_Accept this challenge, walk between worlds, and undo what has been done._

displayProperties.name: Forfeit Shrine
displayProperties.description: A portal to the **Ascendant Plane**.

displayProperties.name: Shattered Ruins
displayProperties.description:
Climb the ruins and eliminate the Taken Phalanx.

_Accept this challenge, walk between worlds, and undo what has been done._

displayProperties.name: Shattered Ruins
displayProperties.description: A portal to the **Ascendant Plane**.

displayProperties.name: Keep of Honed Edges
displayProperties.description:
Eliminate the Hive Wizards, raise a sword, and defeat the Hive Knights.

_Accept this challenge, walk between worlds, and undo what has been done._

displayProperties.name: Keep of Honed Edges
displayProperties.description: A portal to the **Ascendant Plane**.

displayProperties.name: Agonarch Abyss
displayProperties.description:
Reach the bottom and eliminate the Taken Wizards.

_Accept this challenge, walk between worlds, and undo what has been done._

displayProperties.name: Agonarch Abyss
displayProperties.description: A portal to the **Ascendant Plane**.

displayProperties.name: Cimmerian Garrison
displayProperties.description:
This challenge culminates in a fight between the Guardian, a Hive Knight, and three Hive Shriekers, on a spacious platform with various cover from enemy fire.

_Accept this challenge, walk between worlds, and undo what has been done._

displayProperties.name: Cimmerian Garrison
displayProperties.description: A portal to the **Ascendant Plane**.

displayProperties.name: Nightmare of Xortal, Sworn of Crota
displayProperties.description: Defeat this Nightmare to progress record **Wandering Nightmares**.

displayProperties.name: Nightmare of Horkis, Fear of Mithrax
displayProperties.description: Defeat this Nightmare to progress record **Wandering Nightmares**.

displayProperties.name: Nightmare of Jaxx, Claw of Xivu Arath
displayProperties.description: Defeat this Nightmare to progress record **Wandering Nightmares**.

displayProperties.name: Fallen Council
displayProperties.description: Defeat this Nightmare to progress record **Wandering Nightmares**.

displayProperties.name: Queen's Court
displayProperties.description: A portal to **Queen's Court**, Mara Sov's throne world.

displayProperties.name: Salt Mines Cliffs
displayProperties.description: A transmat platform connected to the top of the **Salt Mines** cliffs, powered by jury-rigged **Fallen** parts.

displayProperties.name: Esi Terminal–Irkalla Complex
displayProperties.description: A resonance-powered rift to **Irkalla Complex**.

displayProperties.name: Irkalla Complex–Esi Terminal
displayProperties.description: A resonance-powered rift to **Esi Terminal**.

displayProperties.name: Typhon Imperator: Deep
displayProperties.description: A resonance-powered rift.

displayProperties.name: Typhon Imperator
displayProperties.description: A resonance-powered rift.

displayProperties.name: Temple of the Wrathful
displayProperties.description: A resonance-powered rift.

displayProperties.name: Temple of the Wrathful: Deep
displayProperties.description: A resonance-powered rift.

extended.tip: Stand at the tip of each defense cannon and destroy the resonant anchors to reveal a secret at the cannon farthest from your point of ingress.

displayProperties.description: Near the **Hallows Vex Conflux**, amongst the roots of a dead tree.
Push past the lost sector entry junction and continue along the gangway.
Left of the lost sector's entrance, poorly lit, behind some crates.
Through the waterfall.
Accessible via the **Altar of Reflection** activities.
Behind the fast travel landing zone.

In the rear of the damaged structure, on the third floor, in a room on the right.
Upon reaching **Queen's Court**, scale the wall to the left of the throne.
Requires **Deepsight** to reveal.

displayProperties.name: Find Toland
displayProperties.description: Seek out Toland to hear his ruminations about the Moon.

displayProperties.name: Hunt the Nightmare of Volniks, Deathkeeper
Hunt the Nightmare of Talgoth, Soul Smasher
displayProperties.description: Go to the Gatehouse and take out the Nightmare of Talgoth, Soul Smasher.

displayProperties.description: Seek out Toland to hear his ruminations about the Moon.

Find Toland
displayProperties.description: Seek out Toland to hear his ruminations about the Moon.

displayProperties.name: Secure Your Mask before Helping Others
Chronicler of History
displayProperties.description: Retrieve a three-dimensional scan of a pre-collapse sculpture in Maevic Square.

displayProperties.name: The Scavenge Beast
displayProperties.description: Fallen scavenging crews continue to present a problem in Maevic Square. Eliminate their leader to solve the problem.

displayProperties.name: Mining Operations
displayProperties.description: Descend into the mines and search for any still-functioning Golden Age technology.

displayProperties.name: Those Don't Belong to You
displayProperties.description: Defeat Fallen in Trostland and collect the Forgotten Journals they drop.

displayProperties.name: Urban Flight
displayProperties.description: The Fallen are more familiar with terrain in the Outskits than humanity is. Shift that balance.

displayProperties.name: Cleaning Up the Streets
displayProperties.description: Eliminate Dregs in Trostland and recover their Drained Ether Tanks.

displayProperties.name: Deep, Dark, and Down
displayProperties.description: A Fallen Servitor is stripping the cavern walls for minerals. Put a stop to it.

displayProperties.name: Not in My Backyard
displayProperties.description: Defeat enemies in the streets and buildings of this ruined town.

displayProperties.name: On the Land As on the Sea
This Is For Your Own Goods
Random

displayProperties.name: Alluring Curtain Executioner
displayProperties.description: Defeat the Lucent Executioner garrisoned in Alluring Curtain to progress record **Ascended Bounty Hunter**.

displayProperties.name: Queen's Bailey Executioner
displayProperties.description: Defeat the Lucent Executioner garrisoned in Queen's Bailey to progress record **Ascended Bounty Hunter**.

displayProperties.name: Witch's Echo Executioner
displayProperties.description: Defeat the Lucent Executioner garrisoned in Witch's Echo to progress record **Ascended Bounty Hunter**.

displayProperties.name: Glimmer Extraction
displayProperties.description:
Fallen mining crew have arrived to drill the area for glimmer. Fight them off and out of the area.

Destroy the supporting **control module** by the drill at **each mining location** to trigger heroic.

displayProperties.name: Cabal Excavation
displayProperties.description:
A mining lander drops from the sky, protected by Cabal troops. Guardians in the area are commanded to confiscate the machinery or destroy it.

Destroy the **Thresher** circling above to trigger heroic.

displayProperties.name: Ether Resupply
displayProperties.description:
A **Prime Ether Servitor** has transmat in and is preparing to resupply. Intervene with your weapons.

Destroy **Transport Servitors** to trigger heroic; first one servitor and then three, do so quickly before they transmat.

displayProperties.name: Fallen Artillery
displayProperties.description:
Fallen in the area are preparing to receive artillery; a **Fallen Walker** is en route.

Damage the **Fallen Walker** to generate charges. Deposit the charges into the nearby recepticles to **lower all three shields** to trigger heroic.

displayProperties.name: Injection Rig
displayProperties.description:
The Cabal have landed blasted, rock-shaking, concentration-shattering machinery. Give them a hand.

Destroy the top, middle, and center **thermal vents** to trigger heroic.

displayProperties.name: Witches Ritual
displayProperties.description:
The Hive are relentless; disrupt their ritual and dispel their magic.

Activate **ritual plates** to lower the shields protecting the **crystals**. Destroy both crystals to trigger heroic.

displayProperties.name: Crashed Warsat
displayProperties.description:
One of Rasputin's Warsats has crash-landed. Enemy combatants are gathering to steal its technology and intelligence. Fend them off and prepare the device for transmat.

Destroy each of the **three Hive shriekers** to trigger heroic.

displayProperties.name: Taken Blight
displayProperties.description:
Increased Taken activity in the area; dispose of them, and the blights that provide them succor.

Step into the perimeter of a blight and be granted a buff enabling you to damage the primary blight with conventional weaponry. Destroy the primary blight before the secondary blights to trigger heroic.

displayProperties.name: Spire Integration
displayProperties.description:
The Vex are setting up for spire integration. Prevent Vex from sacrificing against the conflux.

Capture all **three sync plates** to trigger heroic.

displayProperties.name: Ether Ritual
displayProperties.description:
The Scorn are attempting to extract Dark Ether from a Harvester. Shut them down.

**Shoot down** any **ether** flowing towards the Harvester to trigger heroic.

displayProperties.name: The Rift Generator
displayProperties.description:
Defend an Awoken device from hordes of Scorn and Taken manipulations.

Destroy each of the blight spawns to trigger heroic.

displayProperties.name: Resonant Destruction
displayProperties.description:
A **Resonant Splinter** has manifested near. Claim control and guide it to your enemies destruction.

Kill **Resonant Keepers** and throw the **charges** they drop at the Resonant Splinter to trigger heroic.

displayProperties.name: Crux Convergence
displayProperties.description:
Prevent the Fallen from communing with Darkness and destroy their artillery.

Destroy the **small drones** swarming each crux to trigger heroic.
Cliff-side, beneath the path which leads to a lost sector.
Inside the causeway's ceiling.
After completing the sector, proceed to the exit and find the subject on the way out.
Perched upon the midwall of the **Infinite Forest**.
Accessible via the **Wellspring** offensive.
Up in the very top left corner, on the rocks.
Through the rubbled brick wall.
On the catwalk.
Up on the cliff, overlooking Winding Cove, near where Xûr sometimes appears.
Requires a **Firewall Data Fragment**. Acquire prerequisite through Eris Morn.
Frozen in an ice block. Find a **Fallen Captain** near the lifts to **Riis-Reborn Approach** named **Ferkis, Salvation's Squall**—he'll drop what you need.
Under the ice.

Entering the **Circle of Bones** via the **Gatehouse**, turn right and proceed to follow the loop around the **Hellmouth**. Before reaching the next junction, turn on your heel and look beneath the platform to find two jade eyes piercing through your Traveler-given light.

extended.tip: Activate the interface. Turn to face the entrance. There are 8 circular panels. From left to right, top to bottom, shoot the panels in the following order: 6, 8, 4, 5, 2, 7, 3, 1.

This chest requires oneself to transcend their reality. To access:

1. Near **Brother Vance**, find a compelling book. Examine it.
2. Turn 180°. Head to the farthest wall and find the next edition on the bookshelf. Examine it.
3. Move around to the bookcase right of the gateway and find the next edition beside the firepit at the bottom of the bookcase. Examine it.
4. Return to the first bookcase and find the next edition on the desk beside the disciple. Examine it.
5. The final book is hidden high on a bookshelf across the the room, by the forge. Examine it.
6. A **Vex conflux** will appear. Examine it.

displayProperties.description: Enter the dungeon and head to the tower farthest right. Retain some altitude if possible. On the farthest side of the farthest tower, below its foot, is a cypher.
Complete the **Chamber of Suffering** encounter. Before making your way deeper by traversing the height traps, climb carefully to their higest level.

Complete the **Necropolis** encounter and proceed towards The Pit. Once at the wall of paths, climb and turn around. To the right of the hall is a small ledge along the moonstone wall. Use it to step to the upper level of the hallway and proceed to the farthest right side.

In the middlest crouch-way tunnel, closest to the green gas pit where you find the solar orb. Entering the tunnel from the green gas pit side, it will quickly widen into a small room. Stop, turn 180°, and look upwards.

Drop down into the **Tunnels of Despair** and keep right. Enter at the first crouch-way and follow it to its end. You'll see a red door. Standing at the red door turn 70° clockwise. You'll be staring at a boulder. To the right of the boulder is the prize you seek.
Enter **The Gatehouse** via **Hellmouth** and follow it to a well-lit circular room. Along the windowed-wall on the right is what you seek.
In the **Tunnels of Despair**, on a cliff ledge adjacent to the green gas pit.
At the side on the hidden side of the pictured module.
